::: {.lead}
  We are an [interdisciplinary]{.fw-bolder} research group based within the [Department of Psychology](https://psych.ku.edu){.text-primary .text-decoration-none .fw-bolder} at the [University of Kansas](https://ku.edu){.text-primary .text-decoration-none .fw-bolder}. We develop, validate, and apply [computational methods]{.fw-bolder} to advance the study of [emotion]{.fw-bolder}, [interpersonal communication]{.fw-bolder}, and [mental health]{.fw-bolder}.
